channel.title: Soft Robots on Mike Ornstein
channel.description: Recent content in Soft Robots on Mike Ornstein

item.title: Soft Arm
item.description: Project Overview The Humanoids Lab and the Quality of Life Technologies group and Carnegie Mellon formed a project whose goal was to create an inherently safe robot that was able to do useful work. This work was presented at the EBMC 2011 conference with the paper, Physical Human Interaction for an Inflatable Manipulator It also turned out to be the inspiration for Baymax of Big Hero 6!

item.title: Soft Wrist and Gripper
item.description: Project Overview A wrist actuated by tendons to move around an inflatable grasper. Provisionally patented!
